summary: The night a mysterious stranger rode into the lonely prairie town of West Sage, no one realized their lives would never be the same.
cast: Tom Bosley|Florence Henderson|Bruce Marchiano|Paige O'Hara|Malcolm-Jamal Warner|Ossie Davis|Jay Underwood|James K. Flynn|Lura Nicole Lauer|Jimmy Martins
title: Legend of the Candy Cane
